title: Adventure in maturity

description: A middle-aged woman living with her son constantly thinks of the 'old days'. Through the intervention of an old friend, her interest in life is re-awakened as she visits a beauty parlour and rejuvenates her appearance, takes a job in the community and is once more busy and active.
